questions.question: Which modern architectural marvel is known for its unique twisting design and was completed in 2016 in the Middle East, standing among the tallest residential buildings in the world?
questions.context: This iconic skyscraper features a 90-degree twist and is a prominent part of the Dubai Marina skyline.

questions.question: Which UNESCO World Heritage Site in India, known for its stepwell architecture, dates back to the 11th century and was constructed during the reign of the Chalukya dynasty?
questions.context: This intricately designed stepwell was built as a memorial and is recognized for its detailed sculptures.

questions.question: What famous museum in Europe started as a fortress in the 12th century and is now home to thousands of classic and modern artworks, including the 'Mona Lisa'?
questions.context: The museum is one of the largest in the world and is the most visited, attracting millions each year.

questions.question: Which historical battle site in Africa was pivotal in ending Italian occupation in 1896, marking a victory for an African state against a European colonizer?
questions.context: This site is where Ethiopian forces under Emperor Menelik II defeated the Italian army, maintaining Ethiopia's independence.

questions.question: What ancient ruin in Italy, buried under volcanic ash in 79 AD, provides an exceptional snapshot of Roman life at that time?
questions.context: Rediscovered in the 18th century, these ruins are famous for their well-preserved buildings, frescoes, and artifacts.
